Articles.Content:
Hey guys!

I have seen a view images in the internet of people showing their crafts with all sorts of technical details looking like a blueprint. e.g.: https://www.pinterest.at/pin/447615650457193592/

How do I get a side image of my craft/rocket without any parts being hidden or distorted due to perspective like in the example?

Thanks in advance!

Mod called Kronal Vessel Viewer
